location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates on the last folio with 16; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the reorganization of consular posts in Persia and the establishment of a British Consulate at Dizful.The file is composed solely of internal correspondence between the Foreign Office, the India Office, the Secretary of State for India, and the Government of India.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India and Burma, United Kingdom
